markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, desire and greed for craving for sights, craving for sounds, craving for smells, craving for tastes, craving for touches, or craving for thoughts is a corruption of the mind. …”

SN.27.9. Dhātusutta (“Elements”)
